overview: When four couples live together under the same roof, something is bound to go wrong. That something happens when Alice finds a diamond engagement ring hidden inside a cabinet! A myriad of thoughts overcome the girls when Alice tells them of her find. Who is the lucky girl? Is it too soon? Is it too late? Is this Mr. Right or Mr. Not So Right? A whirlwind of emotion hits everybody by surprise as the girls try to discover which one of their boyfriends intends to propose. And with this ring, they just might learn how to appreciate each other a little more.
title: With This Ring
